summary.span: 提供授权实用工具，以支持特定 Web 程序配置、程序集注册和程序集密钥容器操作。

span.span: Provides authorization utilities to support specific Web-application configuration, assembly registration, and assembly-key container manipulation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的实用工具函数支持 `system.web` 程序集注册。The class provides utility functions that support the `system.web` assembly registration.

summary.span: 允许根据提供的参数对配置节和程序集密钥容器执行特定操作。

span.span: Allows specific manipulation of configuration sections and assembly-key containers based on the supplied parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在内部使用，用于保护和取消保护配置中的部分。The method is used internally to protect and unprotect sections within the configuration. 方法还支持程序集密钥容器操作。The method also supports assembly-key container manipulation.

summary.span: 注册或注销正在执行的 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 程序集。

span.span: Allows the executing Microsoft Management Console (MMC) assembly to be registered or unregistered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在内部用于注册或注销正在执行的 MMC 程序集。Used internally to register or unregister the executing MMC assembly.
